description: measure that is estimated by analyst
U.S. Firm (USFIRM=0 if from .INT and USFIRM=1 if from .US file) (USFIRM)
Actual Value from the Detail Actuals File (ACTUAL)
Announce Date of the Actual from the Detail Actuals File (ANNDATS_ACT)
source of the data is domestic or international
code indicates how the data is collected and presented
DLC -- Debt in Current Liabilities - Total (DLC)
IBC -- Income Before Extraordinary Items (Cash Flow) (IBC)
OANCF -- Operating Activities Net Cash Flow (OANCF)
IVNCF -- Investing Activities Net Cash Flow (IVNCF)
FINCF -- Financing Activities Net Cash Flow (FINCF)
PPENT -- Property Plant and Equipment - Total (Net) (PPENT)
PPEGT -- Property Plant and Equipment - Total (Gross) (PPEGT)
XINT -- Interest and Related Expense - Total (XINT)
XSGA -- Selling General and Administrative Expense (XSGA)
indicates whether the company is currently active or inactive on the Compustat database
APALCH -- Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities Increase/(Decrease) (APALCH)
AOLOCH -- Assets and Liabilities Other Net Change (AOLOCH)
